     for(var i = 0; i < cache.childNodes.length; i++) {

    if(window.location.href.indexOf("boutiques") > -1) {
    var cache = document.querySelector('main section');
     for(var i = 0; i < cache.childNodes.length; i++) {
         if(cache.childNodes[i].nodeType === 3 && (cache.childNodes[i].data.replace(/\s/g, "") == '#X-FF-layout-partial:_TooltipGender#')) {
              cache.childNodes[i].remove();

    if(window.location.href.indexOf("boutiques") > -1) {
    var cache = document.querySelector('main section');
     for(var i = 0; i < cache.childNodes.length; i++) {
         if(cache.childNodes[i].nodeType === 3 && (cache.childNodes[i].data.replace(/\s/g, "") == '#X-FF-layout-partial:_TooltipGender#')) {
              cache.childNodes[i].remove();
         }
     }
 }

      <style>
       .landing-module.bgcolor-medium-grey{margin-top:-10px}.module-pos{min-height:50px;display:-webkit-flex;display:flex;display:-ms-flexbox;align-items:center;-ms-flex-align:center}@media (max-width:1024px){.module-pos.container{padding:0}}.module-pos-item{padding:10px}.module-pos-icon,.module-pos-icon-footer{font-size:29px;font-size:2.9rem;margin-top:-7px}@media (max-width:1024px){.module-pos-icon,.module-pos-icon-footer{clear:both;padding-right:0;margin-top:0}}.module-pos-title,.module-pos-title-footer{margin-top:5px}@media (max-width:1024px){.module-pos-title,.module-pos-title-footer{font-size:13px;font-size:1.3rem;margin-top:0}}@media (max-width:480px){.module-pos{display:block}.module-pos-item.xs-underline{border-bottom:1px solid #f5f5f5}.module-pos-item.xs-underline:last-of-type{border-bottom:none}.module-pos-icon{padding-left:10px}.module-pos-title{margin-top:5px}}.module-pos-icon,.module-pos-icon-footer,.module-pos-title,.module-pos-title-footer{display:inline-block;text-align:center}@media (max-width:1024px){.module-pos-icon,.module-pos-title{float:left;position:relative}}.module-pos-divider,.module-pos-divider-footer{position:absolute;display:block;top:50%;right:0;-webkit-transform:translate(0,-50%);-moz-transform:translate(0,-50%);-o-transform:translate(0,-50%);-ms-transform:translate(0,-50%);transform:translate(0,-50%);min-height:35px;height:35px;width:1px}.lt-ie9 .module-pos-divider,.lt-ie9 .module-pos-divider-footer{top:20%}@media (max-width:480px){.module-pos-icon-footer,.module-pos-title-footer{display:block}.module-pos-icon,.module-pos-title{text-align:left}.module-pos-divider{display:none}}

   <script type="text/javascript">
    if(window.location.href.indexOf("boutiques") > -1) {
    var cache = document.querySelector('main section');
     for(var i = 0; i < cache.childNodes.length; i++) {
         if(cache.childNodes[i].nodeType === 3 && (cache.childNodes[i].data.replace(/\s/g, "") == '#X-FF-layout-partial:_TooltipGender#')) {
              cache.childNodes[i].remove();
         }
     }
 }
   </script>
